  • Classes in it.escape.core.server.model.game.cards used by it.escape.core.server.model.game.cards 
    Class and Description
    Card 
    Deck
    This class defines the behaviour of a deck of cards; The data structure is an ArrayList of Card objects; there is also a int counter variable, that keeps track of the number of cards left in the deck; objects are not destroyed and recreated when cards are drawn; instead, the counter variable is decremented.
